alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wibaux, central Dawson and southwestern Richland Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 10 miles northwest of Intake, or 21 miles north of Glendive, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendive, Richey, Lambert, Bloomfield, Savage, Intake, Enid, Stipek, Midway and Burns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
